title: Viber Account Checker Input
description: Input schema for checking Viber account registration by phone numbers

phoneNumbers.title: Phone Numbers
phoneNumbers.description: Array of phone numbers (e.g., ['+1234567890']) or a single CSV URL containing phone numbers

maxRequests.title: Maximum Requests
maxRequests.description: Maximum number of phone numbers to check

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Proxy configuration (optional, e.g., { groups: [{ useApifyProxy: true }] })
